## Example Release Notes:

# Release v0.3.0

## ğŸ‰ What's New

- **Linux Support** - c9watch now runs on Linux! Includes support for popular editors and window managers.

## ğŸ› Bug Fixes

- Fixed session detection timing issues
- Improved error handling for corrupted session files

## ğŸ”§ Improvements

- Refactored platform-specific code for better maintainability
- Added contribution guidelines and PR templates

## ğŸ™ Contributors

Thank you to everyone who contributed to this release:

- @cynaptic - Implemented full Linux support with platform conditionals and xdotool integration
- @minchenlee - Added contribution documentation and improved project structure
